page.title: 12Hobbies
page.content: library is in South Molton. There is in the library a club. What you do is you pick a book with a coloured dot in it then when you take the book back you have to tell a librarian what the book was about. 7 people like stamp collecting. You can buy stamps in the Post Office in the square and also in Moules in South Molton. 6 people like dancing. On Saturday mornings there are two dancing clubs. There is one at the Church hall in Duke Street and the other one at the 59 club in North Street. At both clubs you can do ballet, tap or modern. 5 people liked music. You can go to a music centre on Monday evenings at the South Molton Secondry school. Other people liked collecting doll things, sports, gym, fishing, pressing flowers and collecting badges.
